featured.text: “They are very hot this year,” said Yossi Fogel at B & H Photo in New York.

definition.zh_def: 一個常見的男性名字，源自希伯來語，意為「上帝將增加」或「上帝將增添」。
definition.en_def: A common male name of Hebrew origin meaning 'God will increase' or 'God will add.'
definition.example: Yossi is known for his kindness and generosity.
